import React from "react"; const About = () => { return (

About

Hey there! I'm Arohan, a machine learning enthusiast currently pursuing my Master's in Computer Science at NC State. My journey in the world of AI and data science began during my undergrad days at Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology, where I laid a strong foundation in IT.

Fast-forward to today, I've had the opportunity to work on some fascinating projects that have fueled my passion for leveraging technology to solve real-world problems. From developing a hate speech detection model for Tamil social media content to optimizing neural networks for measuring children's heights, I've been constantly pushing the boundaries of what's possible with machine learning. When I'm not immersed in coding or exploring the latest ML techniques, you can find me sharing my knowledge with junior students as a researcher and coordinator at the AI Society. I believe in the power of collaboration and love connecting with fellow tech enthusiasts to discuss the exciting advancements in our field.

When I’m not at the computer, I’m usually trekking, spending time with my friends, or watching Formula One.

); }; export default About;
